post_text: Last Friday DC Bilingual hosted nearly 50 business, education, and philanthropic leaders for First Friday - a series of monthly learning tours that spotlight high performing charter schools across the city. They toured our school building and spoke with DC Bilingual teachers and staff to learn more about our program and how they can advocate for and support the work we are doing in our community. Learn more about these tours at www.firstfridaysdc.org.
